effect.sun_moon: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target’s side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target’s side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target’s side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.
